favourite.article: My beloved late Mama and Papa used to sing this song on my birthdays... I will sing it to my children and grandchildren to be.

The Lord is our Shepherd and supply so that we could be wrought with the divine element of God. God is after His expression, so that the Body, the church may be built which will consummate in the New Jerusalem. Praise the Lord!
Hallelujah ! For my head is anointed with oil ! My cup runneth over with joy ! My pleasure is Jesus my Lord ! Lord, how we love You !
I remember singing this at all the young people's meetings.

Oh, how I love this hymn because through this hymn I can see the lovingkindness, grace, and mercy our Lord Jesus bestows upon us every day as we walk through the valley. How we can rest in Him and enjoy all His goodness and riches. Hallelujah, praise Him forever.

O what a Shepherd, all the days of our life,
"Goodness" refers to Christ "Mercy," the Father "follow us" the Spirit!

He is Indeed Jehovah Jireh - As we look to this great Shepherd of our souls He will bring us beside the still waters and 'There' He will provide for us. His paths are always Straight. There is a place where He wants us to be and so long as we are there He will be faithful to His word. He is the chief Shepherd!
Great song, perfect lyrics, touching words. With this meditation daily, we need not fear or dread our Shepherd's total and a cocksure provision. He is indeed JEHOVAH-RAAH.
How I enjoy my dear Lord is my dear Shepherd! And all the days of my life I will continue to enjoy His shepherding me in love and life!

This song is so special. It says everything about our relationship with God. My mum passed away hearing this passage read to her, it gave her the strength to go to our beloved Saviour,knowing His unending love.
Praise the Lord He is my shepherd. I want to dwell in Him to enjoy His riches. How wonderful! Amen.
I testified He is my Shepherd forever including these days. He knows how to shepherd me and knows who can do this task with. He is wonderful and the shepherd He gave me is as wonderful as He is.

This song is wonderful, I love the psalm it comes from, Psalm 23 which reminds us that our precious Lord is our Shepherd and no matter what stage of our christian life we are at, He can meet our needs!!
This is my favorite verse in the whole Bible.

This song is so wonderful, because it reminds us that the Lord is the One shepherding us daily. Hopefully, it can be moment by moment. I am reminded of the wonderful Blending Conference that we had last weekend, because we all thoroughly enjoyed this hymn. This will defintely remain a favorite of mine.
